page.title: 03SOUTH SPONDON AND SCHOOL
page.content: Houses in the area are predominantly semi-detached council and privately-owned properties built in phases during this century.There are also multi-story blocks of flats and purpose-built groups of bungalows and flats for the elderly and disabled.The latter have warden supervision.Gardens in the area range from completly over grown to extremely well-maintained and presented.{ASTERDALE PRIMARY SCHOOL}is a concrete building with metal windows and door frames.Sound is amplified by the hard internal surfaces.There are approximately 190 juniors and infants,plus 110 nursery pupils who attend five half days a week.The teaching establishment is head plus 8 staff.The appearance of the building is enchanced by external and internal wall paintings.The school has its own playing field.
